file_edits.reasoning: Added comprehensive docstring for the search_companies method, documenting all parameters, return value, and the method's purpose of searching and filtering RIA companies with optional fuzzy name matching.

edits.content:
@staticmethod
    def search_companies(
        name: Optional[str] = None,
        domain: Optional[str] = None,
        state: Optional[str] = None,
        city: Optional[str] = None,
        country: Optional[str] = None,
        min_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        max_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        min_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        max_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        min_non_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        max_non_discretionary_aum: Optional[float] = None,
        min_total_employees: Optional[int] = None,
        max_total_employees: Optional[int] = None,
        min_total_offices: Optional[int] = None,
        max_total_offices: Optional[int] = None,
        # Client type filters (Y/N)
        individual_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        high_net_worth_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        banking_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        investment_companies_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        pension_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        charity_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        state_municipal_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        investment_advisor_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        insurance_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        sovereign_wealth_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        corporate_clients: Optional[str] = None,
        # Private funds filter
        private_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        # Asset class filters (Y/N)
        has_hedge_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_liquidity_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_pe_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_real_estate_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_securitized_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_vc_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        has_other_funds: Optional[str] = None,
        limit: int = 10,
        offset: int = 0,
    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """Search and filter RIA companies with comprehensive filtering and optional fuzzy name matching.

        Performs multi-criteria search across RIA company data with support for geographic,
        financial, client type, and asset class filters. When a name is provided, uses
        intelligent fuzzy matching to find similar company names.

        Args:
            name: Company name for fuzzy search matching
            domain: Company domain/website filter
            state: State location filter
            city: City location filter
            country: Country location filter
            min_aum: Minimum assets under management
            max_aum: Maximum assets under management
            min_discretionary_aum: Minimum discretionary AUM
            max_discretionary_aum: Maximum discretionary AUM
            min_non_discretionary_aum: Minimum non-discretionary AUM
            max_non_discretionary_aum: Maximum non-discretionary AUM
            min_total_employees: Minimum number of employees
            max_total_employees: Maximum number of employees
            min_total_offices: Minimum number of offices
            max_total_offices: Maximum number of offices
            individual_clients: Filter for individual clients (Y/N)
            high_net_worth_clients: Filter for high net worth clients (Y/N)
            banking_clients: Filter for banking clients (Y/N)
            investment_companies_clients: Filter for investment company clients (Y/N)
            pension_clients: Filter for pension clients (Y/N)
            charity_clients: Filter for charity clients (Y/N)
            state_municipal_clients: Filter for state/municipal clients (Y/N)
            investment_advisor_clients: Filter for investment advisor clients (Y/N)
            insurance_clients: Filter for insurance clients (Y/N)
            sovereign_wealth_clients: Filter for sovereign wealth clients (Y/N)
            corporate_clients: Filter for corporate clients (Y/N)
            private_funds: Filter for private funds (Y/N)
            has_hedge_funds: Filter for hedge funds (Y/N)
            has_liquidity_funds: Filter for liquidity funds (Y/N)
            has_pe_funds: Filter for private equity funds (Y/N)
            has_real_estate_funds: Filter for real estate funds (Y/N)
            has_securitized_funds: Filter for securitized funds (Y/N)
            has_vc_funds: Filter for venture capital funds (Y/N)
            has_other_funds: Filter for other fund types (Y/N)
            limit: Maximum number of results to return
            offset: Number of results to skip for pagination

        Returns:
            Dictionary containing search results with total_matches count, matches list,
            pagination metadata, and filter status information.
        """
        # Load index data
        index_cache = get_index_cache()
        df = index_cache.load()
edits.description: Added comprehensive docstring for the search_companies method, documenting all parameters, return value, and the method's purpose of searching and filtering RIA companies with optional fuzzy name matching.
